name: Last Jump (Miz Jam 1)
description:
Your hero found himself in the middle of nowhere. 
Your goal is to help him to stay alive as long as possible by creating new platforms on his way.

___________________________________________________________________________________

Instructions:

Press left mouse button or 'E' to create platform.
New platforms are getting shorter over time.

Collect white power-ups to restore your magic
and maintain your platform's size

Avoid red items, they will reduce your power.

___________________________________________________________________________________
